commenter_a: And in case you have forgotten all the other bodies this witch has left in her wake......Just a quick refresher course ‘lest we forget’ what has happened to many “friends” of the Clintons. 1- James McDougal – Clinton’s convicted Whitewater partner died of an apparent heart attack, while in solitary confinement.
